title: Mate2237
author: Mate2237
created_time: January 26, 2023, 03:50:57 PMLast edit: January 27, 2023, 06:41:44 PM by Mate2237
content: Rank up nd weti u don achieve nd u want 2 announce am, do am here 2 avoid repetition of threads nd spamming.Di way u dey do am 4 there also use Pidgin English 2 do am if want 2. Any rank u aquire, merits, promotion, etc. Like example:I Just Entered Sr. Member Rank this WeekDi long waited rank finally open dis week Wednesday. It was not easy 4 di journey, those wey no fit, dem give up, but I no give up 4rom brand newbie 2 newbie, nd newbie 2 Jr. Member nd Jr. Member 2 Member nd Member 2 Full Member nd Full Member 2 Sr. Member nd now there are two ranks 4 me 2 attain. Nd I believe God go do am 4 me. I also encourage newbies, Jr. Member, Member and Full Members 2 post qualitative nd not quantitative so dat dem go rank faster.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: For ranking up and other achievements? In my opinion, you can edit this thread for that purpose. Former local thread is now for newbie's introduction and orientation

comments.author: Agbe
comments.body: 1000+ Merits Achieved2day nai dey make three months wen I join dis forum and I bin dey suffer well well, in dis naija board nobody suffer pass me. Bt might be, I know y I dey tok so, on di 7th of December last year, I created dis thread https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5426574.msg61407689#msg61407689 to celebrate my one year in di forum. In di forum, good name is one of the important thing one must maintain, and I am also trying my best to maintaining dat one. Nd anoda one is the MERITS obtaining nd Ranking Up. I don't know how to say it but God has been faithful to me in di forum. 2day I don achieve 1000+ merits which is di highest merit 2 enter di last Rank in di forum. I am very much excited. I am also encouraging odas dat want 2 rank up with Merit 2 be patient. Just quality posts den all is done. I want 2 tanks The Sceptical Chymist, Igehhh now Igebotz, Â My Bosses I never fail u nd I will not Di Virus himself. Lovesmayfamilis, Welsh, fillippone, NotATether, EFS, DdmrDdmr, The Cryptovator, Adbitco, JayJuanGee, o_e_l_e_o, Charles-Tim nd Oda names 2 mention. Pls accept my Greetings. The Sceptical Chymist I specially thanks you for your generosity. God bless you.

comments.author: Coyster
comments.body: Congratulations Mate2237 and Agbe, una don do wella and una deserve wetin una don achieve, e no they easy at all to earn merits consistently for this forum, the user must they post wetin be quality and constructive posts, and for una to achieve the ranks and merits wey una get now, e show say una follow for users wey they post wetin make sense for forum. Una don try, as una don open this thread so, i know say many other Naija users go also get their own achievements, so them go post am here and we go celebrate with them.

comments.author: sokani
comments.body: A very big congratulations to Mate2237 on your senior member rank and to you Agbe on your 1000+ merit achievement. I know it hasn't been all rosy as you must have been confronted by some challenges and discouragement along the way but your resilience and commitment for self improvement, knowledge and contribution to the forum is gradually paying off. Today, I join everyone in raising a glass to you guys. Cheers! ðŸ¥‚

comments.author: Asiska02
comments.body: Seeing my fellow Naija people rise to greater heights in the forum fills me with joy and happiness. Congratulations, Mate2237 and Agbe, on your new accomplishments; you've both set a new record in the forum. I anticipate you guys accomplishing more in subsequent times to come in the forum.Wuna two don try wella, make wuna take some time cool off and celebrate wuna selves.

comments.author: Sexylizzy2813
comments.created_time: March 17, 2023, 12:37:51 AMLast edit: March 17, 2023, 01:31:45 AM by Sexylizzy2813
comments.body: My mouth too small to shout plenty plenty nah, Mate2237 make I congratulate you big big as you struggle like Arsenal go reach greater height wey you no go fit come down, continue the struggle nah God go generate wings for you and other of our brodas and sistas wey dy here... Thank God for unaMe I never fit talk but from newbies to this place I dy now, e even shock me I no fit shout...Thank una wey see me as person wey no go put sand for una garri...

comments.author: Hyphen(-)
comments.body: Make I follow congratulate my fellow Nija colleagues here on their achievement, e no actually de easy to come dis far for d forum, but una hard work keep una moving up till this stage, I pray for greater height and more achievement both in the forum and outside d forum.Congratulations Agbe and Mate2237 on una latest achievement.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Our adage say person wey like good thing when any thing good happen or take place make you too wey like good thing follow celebrate am because wetin you pray to happen to others God go make happen to you. Make I use this opportunity to celebrate and congratulate our senior comrades them wey dey celebrate their achievement Agbe and Mate2237. A very big congratulations on una achievement. E no easy for this giant strides for this platform. For person to grow through ranks, the hurdles no be here no to talk of the activities wey person dey engage him or herself here for no easy. My prayers be say make God guide us through as we journey this industry, more wisdom to contribute our quota to this platform wey go make us recognized and not the least, make baba God keep us strong and healthy because na only man wey dey strong go fit work well. Once again congratulations mates. We are heading there.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: I don't have much to say but to drop by and say congratulations to you, Agbe, and Mate2237. Rank is possible to archive but requires commitment, consistency, and quality contribution, like Agbe said.

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: Bump: I thank everyone who celebrated with me, gud things in di forum had to bi celebrated and as u celebrate with we/people will also celebrate with you. Really it was not easy 2 enta into Sr. Member in journey, one need courage nd determination 2 make dat position. Nd to Agbe, I join oda well meaning uers in di board 2 celebrate ur achievement. Ur meritocratic achievement needs 2 bi celebrated, u have done well. Congratulations.

comments.author: Majestic-milf
comments.body: Make I use this opportunity to congratulate and celebrate with piple wey better don happen for becos them say if you no jolly with person wey God don bless nobody go celebrate you too and you go be like bad person. As we celebrate una success e no meaning say we no go look out for each other oh, bcos the more we look out for each other na so we go dy grow together and no hate for here and make we carri the ones wey dy come up along too.So, Congrats to all of us and make we grow in one love together...I salute una wella.

comments.author: Merit.s
comments.body: @ Mate congrats for things no easy to rank up for this forum but because of your dedication and commitment to forum activities don bring you from all the way as a newbie reach this rank. @ Agbe I see say everything we you don sacrifice for bitcoin both inside and outside the forum na e knack u those merits. Na the highest rank merit,na e you don achieve as a senior member, this show say oil dey your head. Congrraats.

comments.author: Agbe
comments.body: Newly Hero Member in Di Local BoardI don received Hero Member Merits tey tey, since last year Â  August, nai I get dat no nd since I been dey wait patiently 4 di Rank nd today, I don enter di long waited rank. 4 we local board, leme tank Smartvirus wey bi ma personal person all di 4rom Rvs. Brainboss, Charles- Tim, And 2 all my age group/friends in di board such as Davidvictorson, Adbitco, Wiwo, Marykeller, etc.I don greet dose who helped me won way 2 di oda in di general board The Long Waited Hero Member Rank Unlocked. It was not easy but good see me through.I wish di same grace to all who wish me gud.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Quote from: Agbe on April 06, 2023, 07:40:13 AMNewly Hero Member in Di Local BoardI don received Hero Member Merits tey tey, since last year Â  August, nai I get dat no nd since I been dey wait patiently 4 di Rank nd today, I don enter di long waited rank. 4 we local board, leme tank Smartvirus wey bi ma personal person all di 4rom Rvs. Brainboss, Charles- Tim, And 2 all my age group/friends in di board such as Davidvictorson, Adbitco, Wiwo, Marykeller, etc.I don greet dose who helped me won way 2 di oda in di general board The Long Waited Hero Member Rank Unlocked. It was not easy but good see me through.I wish di same grace to all who wish me gud. No be joke I dey feel your vibe like this big man.Welcome to the club my manest man, although e pure for you onto say you don already get the needed merits to climb but activity no come allow you enter there to jolly that fresh breeze of a Hero, no worri Legendary dey next to your door post.I just say congratulations again for entering there in good health and happiness.Rock on big man.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: Agbe on April 06, 2023, 07:40:13 AMNewly Hero Member in Di Local Board[/centre]Agbe all the while I never thought to take a look at your activities as I already rated you Hero long ago, but yeah men this is bitcointalk and you must follow the rules to rank up so it took you this while to get your official Hero rank, more grace my brother and once again congratulations for the new achievement Hero member make sense since na the same signature space with Legendary so you done enter the rank of the top men around. Â I urge you to continue with persistent learning and improvement that will further stand you out among the rest, and keep contributing your quarter to the discussions here in the local boards and the entire forum in general, indeed Bitcoin is the currency that gives freedom to every aspect of our life, and bitcointalk gave us the platform to make all of this discussions happen. Â Once again congratulations my man well well, bless up bro and more winz, I give you an extra score for this.

comments.author: Marykeller
comments.body: Quote from: Agbe on April 06, 2023, 07:40:13 AMNewly Hero Member in Di Local BoardI don received Hero Member Merits tey tey, since last year Â  August, nai I get dat no nd since I been dey wait patiently 4 di Rank nd today, I don enter di long waited rank. 4 we local board, leme tank Smartvirus wey bi ma personal person all di 4rom Rvs. Brainboss, Charles- Tim, And 2 all my age group/friends in di board such as Davidvictorson, Adbitco, Wiwo, Marykeller, etc.I don greet dose who helped me won way 2 di oda in di general board The Long Waited Hero Member Rank Unlocked. It was not easy but good see me through.I wish di same grace to all who wish me gud. Congratulations to you for the long waited rank don come to be finally. I d happy for you wella because em no d easy to push am through within a short period of time to this level. I follow people wey see you grow from member to this stage now and I know how much knowledge, awareness and hard work wey you don put to this forum to arrive your recently announce rank (Hero). Although na legendary wey you for d but your activity never reach so. Each time I remember you, I feel joy sae, person go fit be anything wey em go fit be for this forum if em mind and hard work to am. You even d among our Naija people wey I d salama for and wey the represent us wella for btt board. My advice be sae make una no relent like sae you don arrive. Make una continue to the post good, make us proud and help the newbies wey d come up new for the forum. All the same, congratulation to you once more, I go also be here to see you announce your Legendary rank wey you don reach

comments.author: Hyphen(-)
comments.body: Quote from: Agbe on April 06, 2023, 07:40:13 AMNewly Hero Member in Di Local BoardCongratulations on your new Hero Member rank Agbe, E no actually de easy, but with time God don do am for you.I want make you keep the good work wey u don de do, as a Hero Member for this our Local Board, many beginners de expect much from you which includes basic guides and some useful information.Even though you don already get Legendary rank merit, I still they wish you more merits to come.once again, Congratulations.

comments.author: Mr.suevie
comments.body: Full member acheivedMy people of this wonderful forum I greet una o,Â  I saw this thread in our local board so I decided I should come share my joy with my fellow naija peps for the forum, at first when I started and visited the forum everything looked so confusing especially when you display the site on your mobile phone, I mean the write up dem go make you think say you no go fit understand anything but with perseverance and hardwork, I can gladly boost of many knowledge about crypto has improved and am readyÂ  to share to other users who are in need.I have enqured so many things on the forum plus additional bonus today as I Don officially turn a forum full member so I dey too happy, e no easy but one thing wey I like this life be say so far as seriousness dey for waiting u dey do you go surely achieve am weda the storm comes or not. I Don enjoy so many benefits from this forum as I Don know how to buy crypto, send crypto, also have my little investment when I dey DCA anytime small money enter hand and hoping to hold till anoda ATH come. so in all, joy just full my belle as I set see my rank as full member now. A big thank to all who made this achievement surface @

comments.author: DaNNy001
comments.body: My brodas and sisters I wan congratulation everyone wey don finally upgrade their ranks because this crypto journey e no easy and also be wan use this medium ask how we fit make this topic always reflect for the first page so that our brodas wey feel say dem wan announce their possible rank up and achievement fit see easily so that much spamming go reduce. For this community we Nigerian na one of the most impressive people wey dey even if dem no praise us I go praise all our efforts.
